title: Lesson 7 - One Minute Icelandic
itunes:title: Lesson 7 - One Minute Icelandic
description:
In this lesson you will learn to say that it’s nice to meet someone.

One Minute Icelandic is released weekly and this series features a total of ten lessons. If you’d like to learn faster, use our video versions and lesson booklet, available on the Coffee Break Academy.

One Minute Icelandic is a production of the Coffee Break Academy for Radio Lingua Ltd.
